content: And then, from a trend standpoint, we started to see some of this economic pressure churn a little bit more tougher on our customer in late January and into early Feb. Our January stack was a little softer than we expected, and then, that continued a little bit into early Feb. And to your earliest point, the state of the consumer was, I think, yielding a slightly different story than we first anticipated, let's say, in late December, early Jan. And then when you're - obviously, the guidance is really back-half weighted.
